info.title: Wellcome Collection Identity Services
info.description: This API is part of the Wellcome Collection's Identity platform, providing services which expose operations against user accounts. Users of the API require an API key issues by Wellcome Collection, which is provided as the `X-API-Key` header. Additionally, a number of operations require a `Bearer` token in the `Authorization` header which identifies the caller. These tokens are issued as access tokens by Wellcome Collection's identity and access management platform.
